title: Chapter 1 In the Dark Time
content: THIS IS THE FIRST PAGE of the Book of the Dark, written some six hundred years ago in Berila, on Enlad:

book.title: 地海故事集 Tales from Earthsea
book.description: 简介： Tales from Earthsea is a collection of short stories by American writer Ursula K. Le Guin, first published in 2001. The stories are set in the Earthsea world....
